amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 43 in the Congressional Record of May 7, 1996, to modify the declaration of purpose contained in the bill to reaffirm that it is a goal of the nation that all citizens have decent and affordable housing; that the nation should promote the goal of providing decent and affordable housing for all citizens through the combined efforts of Federal, State, local governments, private citizens, organizations and the private sector.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Watt (NC) amendment was withdrawn.
